mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deck( userId, name, card1, card2, card3, card4, card5, card6, card7, card8, card9, card10, card11, card12, card13, card14, card15, card16, card17, card18, card19, card20, card21, card22, card23, card24, card25, card26, card27, card28, card29, card30 ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{name}, #{card1}, #{card2}, #{card3}, #{card4}, #{card5}, #{card6}, #{card7}, #{card8}, #{card9}, #{card10}, #{card11}, #{card12}, #{card13}, #{card14}, #{card15}, #{card16}, #{card17}, #{card18}, #{card19}, #{card20}, #{card21}, #{card22}, #{card23}, #{card24}, #{card25}, #{card26}, #{card27}, #{card28}, #{card29}, #{card30})
